SELECT commodityId,commodityCode,m.storeId,commodityName,commodityNo,imgMain,specification,inPrice/100 inPrice, salePrice/100 salePrice,vipPrice/100 vipPrice,tag,m.categoryId,info, weight,commodityStatus,unitName,stockNum,upperLimit,lowerLimit,discount,m.status status,productionDate, guaranteeDay,m.addTime `addTime`,m.updateTime updateTime,supplierName,grade,storage, (SELECT categoryName FROM m_category WHERE categoryId =(SELECT parentId FROM m_category WHERE categoryId= m.categoryId)) categoryName FROM m_commodity m left join m_category c on m.categoryId=c.categoryId LEFT JOIN m_unit u ON u.unitId=m.unitId LEFT JOIN m_supplier s ON s.supplierId=m.supplierId where 1=1 and m.storeId=#{relationMap.storeId} and m.status=1
AND c.categoryId IN (SELECT categoryId FROM m_category WHERE parentId=#{relationMap.categoryId})
and m.commodityStatus=#{relationMap.status}
and m.discount=#{relationMap.discount}
AND ( m.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') OR m.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') OR m.commodityCode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') )
and m.stockNum between m.lowerLimit and m.upperLimit
and m.stockNum < m.lowerLimit
and m.stockNum > m.upperLimit
order by addTime desc
